headline: Kenvue Inc. (KVUE) Emerges as Hedge Fund Favorite with Fresh Q1 2025 Buys
summary: Daniel Loeb’s hedge fund, Third Point, has taken a significant position in Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE), acquiring 8.9 million shares valued at over $213 million, signaling interest in potential mergers or strategic shifts aimed at boosting shareholder returns. Meanwhile, Toms Capital Investment Management also made a notable move during the first quarter, purchasing 14.4 million shares […]

headline: Here's How You Can Earn $100 In Passive Income By Investing In Kenvue Stock
summary: Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE) operates as a consumer health company in the U.S. and internationally. It operates through three segments: Self Care, Skin Health and Beauty, and Essential Health. The 52-week range of Kenvue stock price was $17.67 to ...
